_description: A macaronic couplet presumably on the Great Rebellion of 1381

TCD214.Transcription:
In kent alle care by gan ibi pauci sunt sapientesIn a Route
                    þise Rebaudis ran sa sua trepida arma gerentes
TCD214.Note:
Added to fragment of flyleaf at the beginning of the volume; followed by
                        1974 in a different
                    hand.
TCD214.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Poems Dealing with Contemporary Conditions.” 
             A Manual of the Writings in Middle English.
            Albert E. Hartung, ed. 
         Vol. 5, fascicle 13. New Haven, CT: Connecticut Academy of Arts and
            Sciences, 1975: 1385-1536, 1631-1725: 1511.
